I need to come up with a plan.$3#$b#Listen up, all of you!"/faceDirection JJEmpA 1 true/faceDirection JJEmpB 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection JJEmpG 3 true/faceDirection JJEmpW 3 true/{{JulietFaceRight}}/faceDirection Sam 1 true/{{MartinFaceLeft}}/pause 300/speak Morris "From now on, overtime is mandatory and unpaid!$3#$b#We need to cut costs for a deep sale. I want this store spotless, stocked, and sale materials everywhere!$3"/stopMusic/pause 200/jump Sam/textAboveHead Sam "That's not fair!"/pause 500/textAboveHead JJEmpG "Morris, you suck."/pause 700/textAboveHead JJEmpB "Boo!!"/pause 1200/textAboveHead JJEmpW "Okay, boss."/{{JulietHatesIt}}/pause 1000/{{ClaireCatSigh}}/pause 500/playMusic Of Dwarves/emote Shane 40/move Shane 0 -2 0 false/speak Shane "That's illegal, sir. I'm telling Corporate on you!{{MorrisCatShock}}"/speed Morris 4/move Morris 1 0 1/jump Morris/faceDirection Morris 0 true/pause 90/faceDirection Morris 3 true/pause 90/faceDirection Morris 2 true/pause 90/faceDirection Morris 1 true/speed Morris 5/advancedMove Morris false 0 18 2 300/textAboveHead JJEmpA "Get back here, coward!"/pause 1000/faceDirection JJEmpA 2 true/faceDirection JJEmpB 2 true/faceDirection JJEmpW 2 true/faceDirection JJEmpG 2 true/faceDirection Shane 2 true/faceDirection Sam 2 true/{{JulietJessieDown}}/{{MartinClaireDown}}/textAboveHead JJEmpG "Strike!"/pause 500/{{MartinStrike}}/pause 500/textAboveHead Sam "Worker's rights!"/pause 1000/textAboveHead JJEmpB "Strike!"/pause 500/{{JulietStrike}}/pause 500/textAboveHead JJEmpW "Worker's rights!!!"/globalFade/viewport 500 -999/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound phone/pause 1000/playSound phone/pause 1000/playSound phone/pause 1000/playSound smallSelect/pause 200/speak Morris "Look, I need some kind of corporate campaign out here. They're talking about a boycott--$3"/message "So cut the fat in payroll and run a sale."/pause 200/message "These country hicks always fall in line if the prices are low enough."/speak Morris "Yes, that's the other problem. The workers are trying to form a union and threatening a strike if--$3"/message "Union?"/pause 200/message "You said 'union'? You're sure?"/speak Morris "Well, they sure seemed sure about it! I need some union busters out here.$3"/pause 300/message "..."/pause 200/message "Shut the store down."/speak Morris "...$3#$b#What?$3"/pause 200/message "The location won't be profitable enough with a union. We're not wasting lawyers on a handful of country bumpkins. Report back to Zuzu and we'll get you a reassignment."/speak Morris "You're letting them win? I can still--$3"/message "Win?"/pause 200/message "What are they winning? Unemployment?"/pause 200/message "This isn't about 'winning', Morris. It's about efficiency. For every town like this that wants to be an annoyance, there's a dozen more we can make bigger profits off of. This changes nothing in the long run."/pause 200/message "Report back to headquarters in Zuzu and we'll discuss your next post."/pause 200/message "*click*"/speak Morris "...$3"/pause 1000/stopAdvancedMoves/warp Morris 14 20 true/playMusic shaneTheme/speed Morris 3/move Morris 0 -7 0 true/warp Shane 13 9 true/viewport 14 9/viewport move 0 -1 1000/pause 1500/speak Morris "The store is shutting down, effective immediately.$4"/pause 200/emote Sam 8 true/emote Shane 16 true/emote JJEmpG 16 true/emote JJEmpW 8 true/emote JJEmpA 16 true/pause 1000/speak Shane "What?$10"/speak Morris "You heard me. Corporate will send your final checks in the mail.$3#$b#I hope you're happy.$3"/advancedMove Morris false 0 49 2 200/pause 300/textAboveHead JJEmpA "This wasn't supposed to happen..."/pause 1000/textAboveHead JJEmpW "This is the only job I could find!"/pause 1000/textAboveHead JJEmpB "Did we make a mistake?"/pause 1500/{{JulietsLuck}}/{{MartinNoWay}}/speak Sam "Oh man, it's over... What do we do now?$s"/emote Shane 40/move Shane 0 -2 2/speak Shane "What do you mean, what do you do now? You go out and live your life like you actually wanted.$5#$b#Do you really think it's the end of the world because you lost this dead-end job? $5#$b#It wasn't even that much money we were making. It's not like it was saving any of us from poverty.$5"/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Sam! Didn't you say you wanted to be a musician? To make a living off it? Now's your chance."/jump Sam/showFrame Sam 35/pause 300/{{JessieFaceRight}}/faceDirection JJEmpA 1 true/faceDirection JJEmpB 1 true/faceDirection JJEmpW 3 true/faceDirection JJEmpG 3 true/{{MartinClaireLeft}}/pause 500/speak Sam "Yeah, but--$8"/speak Shane "But what? Was that all talk? Or were you really that dedicated to having 'Joja cleaning boy' on your gravestone?"/showFrame Sam 4 true/faceDirection Sam 1/emote Sam 40/speak Sam "You're right. It'll be a bit tighter, but it was mostly spending money anyway.$1#$b#Plus, I can spend more time hanging out with my little brother. He keeps wanting to do stuff, but I haven't had time with my work schedule.$10"/speak Shane "See? You literally have nothing to lose."/pause 1/{{MartinTalkCatA}}/{{MartinTalkCatB}}/{{MartinTalkCatC}}/{{JessieJulesTalkA}}/{{JessieJulesTalkB}}/{{JessieJulesTalkC}}/{{JessieJulesTalkC1}}/{{JessieJulesTalkD}}/{{JessieJulesTalkE}}/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "And all of the rest of you have stuff you want to do, right?
